Author: bee_yonce
Text: yeah i know exactly how you feel. i can spend hours getting dressed even for the most casual outfit

Author: arabella_05
Text: oof your last sentence ... hit hard. i yo-yo so much that my brain has fully stopped trying to compute what size i am lol. so i try to do the same, track my size using clothing but it gets dark real quick. also i find the more obsessed with clothes i get the longer it takes for me to get dressed, even the most basic jumper and leggings combo will take a good 5 outfit changes.
